Name: BoomCrash
About the game: BoomCrash is a small physics-based game aimed at destroying buildings and other architectural structures using explosives. Here you will find colorful buildings and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Plant explosives in vulnerable places of buildings and other structures and blow them up! Take down everything that gets in your way! As a result of a successful demolition, move further and further through the levels! Game Features: - Complete destruction of objects - Physics - Colorful graphics - Nice gameplay
